publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-943.2 Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: A Better Deal for Young People-As an amendment to motion (S2M-943) in the name of Peter Peacock, leave out from "supports" to end and insert "acknowledges that having a strong economy with efficient and effective well-run public services benefits all in society, and specifically calls on the Executive to adopt the schools passport policy, which gives all schools the incentive to achieve and maintain high standards, thereby ensuring a better start in life for Scotland's young people."
